title: Liverpool transfer rumours: Naby Keita and Dani Ceballos updates
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Thursday, January 11.
content: Naby Keita could reportedly join Liverpool in January if they pay an additional Â£13m to RB Leipzig.A deal has already been agreed for next summer, but the Daily Mail say the Reds have been "given encouragement that RB Leipzig could be willing to let their man go earlier".Liverpool hope Roberto Firmino will sign a new contract that will keep him at the club for the rest of his career, according to the Daily Telegraph.Firmino still has two years left on his current deal, but will apparently be offered the chance to sign a new deal.It is reported negotiations have not yet formally started but soon will.Liverpool continue to be linked with a move for Real Madrid's Dani Ceballos.Diario Gol say Ceballos has informed Real Madrid of his desire to leave, but head coach Zinedine Zidane does not wish to lose him this month.Ceballos played for Real Madrid in the Copa del Rey draw with Numancia on Wednesday.Paris Saint-Germain goalkeeper Kevin Trapp says he is happy to stay at the club, despite a lack of first-team action.Trapp has been linked with Liverpool, but said on Wednesday: "For now, I want to stay. I am in Paris, even though I do not have enough playing time."
